item.title: IOT Workshop with raspberry PI
item.description:
January 4, 2025 - IoT Workshop with Raspberry Pi

Today was one of the most educational days Iâ€™ve had in a while. The IoT Workshop for Raspberry Pi, divided into a morning and an evening session, was packed with insights about IoT technologies, hardware, and practical applications. I took extensive notes and captured every key point and demonstration. Here’s the complete breakdown of the day:

Morning Session: Foundations and Hardware of IoT

Time: 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM
